title: Angel

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Give your target invincible defense, and purge them of all negative effects tonight. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You are given a target at the beginning of the game with a winrate lower then 50%.
If your target dies, you will die as well.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Guide your target to victory. Neither of you have to be alive to win.

desc:
Post 2242
*" And for those who would strike down the newest blood, I bring upon you my divine retribution. "*
